channel.title: Beginr on Peng Zhao
channel.description: Recent content in Beginr on Peng Zhao

item.title: R package beginr released on CRAN
item.description: I’m glad to announce that ‘beginr’ (Zhao 2017) is now on CRAN. This post is a brief documentation of ‘beginr 0.1.0’. Subsequent updates can be found on the GitHub site of beginr. Introduction ‘beginr’ is a collection of useful functions for R beginners, including hints for the arguments of the ‘plot()’ function, self-defined functions for error bars, user-customized pair plots and hist plots, enhanced linear regression figures, etc.. This package could be helpful to R experts as well.
